name: SSH
natural_language_description: 这是 SSH 节点。主要用于: Execute commands via SSH

authentication.name: authentication
authentication.natural_language_description: 参数名: Authentication | 默认值: password

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: command

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: upload

command.name: command
command.description: The command to be executed on a remote device
command.natural_language_description: 参数名: Command | 作用: The command to be executed on a remote device

cwd.name: cwd
cwd.natural_language_description: 参数名: Working Directory | 默认值: / | (必填项)

binaryPropertyName.name: binaryPropertyName
binaryPropertyName.description: Object property name which holds binary data
binaryPropertyName.natural_language_description: 参数名: File Property | 作用: Object property name which holds binary data | 默认值: data | (必填项)

path.name: path
path.description: The file path of the file to download. Has to contain the full path including file name.
path.natural_language_description: 参数名: Path | 作用: The file path of the file to download. Has to contain the full path including file name. | (必填项)

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: fileName (值: None) - Overrides the binary data file name
